amendment.description: Amendment sought to decrease funding for the Bureau of Land Management by $162.2 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the amount appropriated for Bureau of Land Management, Management of Lands and Resources, by $162,254,000, from $826,932,000 to$664,678,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Toomey amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 84 - 332 (Roll no. 305).
